items.name: + withBytes
items.desc: Allocates an OSData object with a copy of bytes.

items.name: + withBytesNoCopy
items.desc: Allocates an OSData object with a copy of bytes.

items.name: + withCapacity
items.desc: Allocates an OSData object with preallocated capacity.

items.name: + withData
items.desc: Allocates an OSData object with a copy of bytes from another OSData.

items.name: + withData
items.desc: Allocates an OSData object with a copy of bytes from a subset of another OSData.

items.name: - getBytesNoCopy
items.desc: Returns a pointer to the OSData object's internal data buffer.

items.name: - getBytesNoCopy
items.desc: Returns a pointer to the OSData object's internal data buffer.

items.name: - appendBytes
items.desc: Appends a buffer of bytes to the OSData object's internal data buffer.

items.name: - appendBytes
items.desc: Appends a buffer of bytes to the OSData object's internal data buffer.

items.name: - isEqualTo
items.desc: Compares the data with an OSData

items.name: - isEqualTo
items.desc: Compares the data with an OSString

items.name: - isEqualTo
items.desc: Compares the data with a pointer to bytes

items.name: - isEqualTo
items.desc: Compares the data with an OSObject
